verses.text: \w How|strong="H4100"\w* beautiful \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w thy|strong="H7725"\w* feet \w in|strong="H7725"\w* sandals, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* prince’s daughter! \w the|strong="H7725"\w* joints \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w thy|strong="H7725"\w* thighs \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w like|strong="H7725"\w* jewels, \w the|strong="H7725"\w* work \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* hands \w of|strong="H4264"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cunning workman.

\w Thy|strong="H3027"\w* navel \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \add like \add*\w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w round|strong="H4639"\w* goblet, \add wherein \add*no mingled wine \w is|strong="H4100"\w* wanting: \w thy|strong="H3027"\w* belly \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \add like \add*\w an|strong="H3644"\w* heap \w of|strong="H1323"\w* wheat \w set|strong="H4639"\w* \w about|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* lilies.
Thy two breasts are \w like|strong="H7799"\w* two fawns that are twins \w of|strong="H6194"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* roe.

Thy neck is \w like|strong="H7699"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* tower \w of|strong="H8147"\w* ivory; thine eyes \add as \add*\w the|strong="H8147"\w* pools \w in|strong="H8147"\w* Heshbon, \w by|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* gate \w of|strong="H8147"\w* Bath-rabbim; thy nose is \w like|strong="H7699"\w* \w the|strong="H8147"\w* tower \w of|strong="H8147"\w* Lebanon which looketh toward Damascus.

\w Thine|strong="H6440"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w* \w is|strong="H5869"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* Carmel, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* hair \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w thine|strong="H6440"\w* \w head|strong="H6440"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* purple; \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H5869"\w* held captive \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* tresses \add thereof\add*.
How fair \w and|strong="H4428"\w* how pleasant art thou, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* love, \w for|strong="H5921"\w* delights!

\w This|strong="H4100"\w* thy stature \w is|strong="H4100"\w* like \w to|strong="H4100"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* palm tree, \w and|strong="H3302"\w* thy breasts \w to|strong="H4100"\w* clusters \add of grapes\add*.

\w I|strong="H1819"\w* said, \w I|strong="H1819"\w* will climb up into \w the|strong="H1819"\w* \w palm|strong="H8558"\w* \w tree|strong="H8558"\w*, \w I|strong="H1819"\w* will take hold \w of|strong="H6967"\w* \w the|strong="H1819"\w* branches \w thereof|strong="H6967"\w*: let thy \w breasts|strong="H7699"\w* be as clusters \w of|strong="H6967"\w* \w the|strong="H1819"\w* vine, and \w the|strong="H1819"\w* smell \w of|strong="H6967"\w* thy breath \w like|strong="H1819"\w* apples;

\w And|strong="H5927"\w* thy mouth \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* best wine, \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w goeth|strong="H5927"\w* down smoothly \w for|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* beloved, gliding \w through|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H5927"\w* lips \w of|strong="H1612"\w* \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w are|strong="H1961"\w* asleep.

\w I|strong="H1980"\w* \w am|strong="H1980"\w* \w my|strong="H1980"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*’s, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H1980"\w* desire \w is|strong="H2896"\w* \w toward|strong="H1980"\w* \w me|strong="H1980"\w*.

Come, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*, let \w us|strong="H5921"\w* go forth \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* field; let \w us|strong="H5921"\w* lodge \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* villages.

\w Let|strong="H3212"\w* \w us|strong="H7704"\w* \w get|strong="H3212"\w* \w up|strong="H3318"\w* early \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3318"\w* vineyards; \w let|strong="H3212"\w* \w us|strong="H7704"\w* see whether \w the|strong="H3318"\w* vine hath budded, \add and \add*\w its|strong="H3318"\w* blossom \w be|strong="H7704"\w* open, \add and \add*\w the|strong="H3318"\w* pomegranates \w be|strong="H7704"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* flower: \w there|strong="H3885"\w* \w will|strong="H7704"\w* \w I|strong="H3212"\w* \w give|strong="H7704"\w* \w thee|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H3318"\w* \w love|strong="H1730"\w*.

\w The|strong="H7200"\w* mandrakes \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w forth|strong="H5414"\w* fragrance, \w and|strong="H7925"\w* \w at|strong="H7200"\w* \w our|strong="H5414"\w* doors \w are|strong="H8033"\w* \w all|strong="H7200"\w* manner \w of|strong="H3754"\w* precious fruits, new \w and|strong="H7925"\w* old, \w which|strong="H8033"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w have|strong="H7200"\w* \w laid|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w* \w for|strong="H8033"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w beloved|strong="H1730"\w*.
